values: A loose thing is not held in place tightly.
The bolt was loose, so I tightened it with the wrench.

松散的， 宽松的； 不精确的， 不严密的； 不牢固的； 自由的， 散漫的
To loose is to release something from a constraint or fixed position.
adjective, verb
Not firmly attached or held, or not fitting tightly.
